author: Charlie Spiering
title: Donald Trump Announces CDC Recommendation for Americans to Wear Cloth Masks in Public
description: Trump said Friday that the Centers for Disease Control had decided to recommend Americans wear cloth masks in public. "This is voluntary," he said. "I don't think I'm going to be doing it."
content:
President Donald Trump said Friday that the Centers for Disease Control had decided to recommend Americans wear cloth masks in public.
The CDC is advising the use of nonmedical cloth face covering as an additional voluntary public health measure,” Trump said… [+1285 chars]
